mapper.insert: insert into goodsTbl (regId, pName, pType, stockVolumn, salesVolumn, oriPrice, sellPrice, sellLabel, content, regTM, readCnt, oriFileName, sysFileName, fileSize) values (#{regId}, #{pName}, #{pType}, #{stockVolumn}, #{salesVolumn}, #{oriPrice}, #{sellPrice}, #{sellLabel}, #{content}, now(), 0, #{oriFileName}, #{sysFileName}, #{fileSize})
mapper.update: update goodsTbl set readCnt = readCnt+1 where num = #{num}
mapper.select:
select * from goodsTbl
AND pName like concat('%',#{keyWord},'%' )
AND pType = #{typeSearch}
order by num desc
order by salesVolumn desc
order by sellPrice desc
order by sellPrice asc
order by num desc
limit #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}
select count(*) from wishlist where uId = #{uId} and pNum = #{pNum}
select num from cart where uId = #{uId} and pNum = #{pNum}
mapper.insert: insert into cart (uId, pNum, pVolumn) values (#{uId}, #{pNum}, #{pVolumn})
mapper.update: update cart set pVolumn = pVolumn + #{pVolumn} where num = #{num}
mapper.select: select count(*) from wishlist where uId = #{uId}

select wishlist.num, wishlist.uId, pNum, pName, sellPrice, sysFileName from wishlist inner join goodsTbl on wishlist.pNum = goodsTbl.num where wishlist.uId = #{uId} order by wishlist.num limit #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}
select cart.num, cart.uId, pNum, pVolumn, pName, sellPrice, sysFileName, stockVolumn from cart inner join goodsTbl on cart.pNum = goodsTbl.num where cart.uId = #{uId} order by cart.num desc
mapper.update: update cart set pVolumn = #{pVolumn} where num = #{num}
